title: IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Senior Scientific Officer Post
description: The Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur (IIT Kharagpur) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Scientific Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can...
